Sequence Information.Target Organism: Fungi:Fusarium solani, Sclerotinia sclerotiorum, Phytophtora infestans.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Thionins are small plant proteins which are toxic to animal cells. They seem to exert their toxic effect at the level of the cell membrane.

Literature.Title: Isolation and characterization of cDNAs encoding viscotoxins of mistletoe (Viscum album).
Literature.Author: Schrader G, Apel K.
